config.title: Connect to the Cellar Tracker Server

get_countries.name: Get Countries
get_countries.description: Get a summary of wine inventory by country.

get_locations.name: Get Locations
get_locations.description: Get a summary of wine inventory by location.

get_producers.name: Get Producers
get_producers.description: Get a summary of wine inventory by producer.

get_types.name: Get Types
get_types.description: Get a summary of wine inventory by type.

get_varietals.name: Get Varietals
get_varietals.description: Get a summary of wine inventory by varietal.

get_vintages.name: Get Vintages
get_vintages.description: Get a summary of wine inventory by vintage.

refresh_inventory.name: Refresh Inventory
refresh_inventory.description: Forces an immediate refresh of the inventory list from the Cellar Tracker API.
